name: Sahbhagi Gramin Vikas Samiti
briefDescription: Sahbhagi Gramin Vikas Samiti (SGVS) was established in 1998 by a group of like-minded individuals. At present NGO is operational in 124 villages of Mirzapur and 100 village of Sonbhadra districts in Uttar Pradesh with 7350 HHs and 37759 beneficiaries . SGVS has covered following activities:1.Formation and strengthening of CBOs 2.Livelihood support and environment3.Gender development4.Strenthening local self governance5.Collective leadership6. Child rights and child protection7. Adolescent's health issues.
